attributes.action: WE WANT OUT OF THE EU NOW NOT LATER AND NO MORE PEOPLE COMING IN
attributes.additional_details: SIGN HERE IF YOU AGREE WITH ME THAT WE SHOULD COME OUT OF THE EU AND CLOSE THE GATES SO NO MORE PEOPLE CAN COME IN AND TAKE OUR HOUSING, RUIN OUR NHS, OVERCROWD OUR SCHOOLS, TAKE OUR BENEFITS. THIS IS THE REASON HOUSING IS NOW SO BAD, NHS CANT COPE. WE NEED TO LEAVE THE EU NOW AND HAVE A SAY WHO WE WANT TO STAY IN OUR COUNTRY. OUR BRITISH SOILDERS FOUGHT FOR OUR COUNTRY .... THAT MEANS BRITISH
